meanings.definition: The act of being lazy or lacking motivation.
meanings.sent1: The lazies hit me hard after lunch.
meanings.sent2: The teacher scolded the students for their lazies.
meanings.sent3: The lazies made him skip his workout.
meanings.sent4: The lazies crept in like a slow fog.
meanings.sent5: She couldn't shake off the heaviness of the lazies.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are lazy or unmotivated.
meanings.sent1: The lazies in the office always take long breaks.
meanings.sent2: The lazies gathered by the couch for a movie marathon.
meanings.sent3: The lazies team struggled to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent4: The lazies huddled together like a flock of sleepy birds.
meanings.sent5: He felt suffocated by the presence of the lazies around him.

meanings.definition: To behave lazily or without effort.
meanings.sent1: She lazies around on weekends, watching TV all day.
meanings.sent2: He lazies through his chores, always procrastinating.
meanings.sent3: The cat lazies in the sun, enjoying the warmth.
meanings.sent4: The river lazies its way through the valley, meandering gently.
meanings.sent5: Don't lazies through life, seize every opportunity!
